creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: two facing figures, rendered in black ink with a very fine brush; musician L is kneeling, wearing flowing robes, with drum on lap; figure on R kneels, also wearing flowing robes, bracelets, holding an object with two hands in front of face; Japanese character at UR
markings: on back, center, in pencil: [Baiitsu/1783-1856]; on back of mount, in black felt tip: [Addiss]
title: Two Buddhist Musicians
